title: Where can I find official music notes for hindi songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you are talking about staff notation, I'm afraid there is hardly any organised website except 10magicalfingers.com but it's not totally free. If you are looking for Hindustani Swarlipi (Sa Re Ga Ma type) or Western Notation in letters (C D F# Bb type) you can try your luck with the following sites. Piano Daddy | Piano Notes | Learn Piano Online | Online EducationHitXP - Magazine by GurudevPiano Enthalpy | Free Song Piano Noteshindisongnotes.com - Registered at Namecheap.comNotes & Sargam : play instrumental Hindi, English, regional songs tunesHarmonium Guru - Learn Music In Easy WayPiano Keyboard NotesPiano Song NotationsPiano Notes

There are tons of songs notes and chords, including songs that have band versions which provide notes for prelude/interludes and bar-by-bar chords too in http://htpp://KeyLessOnline.com - You will get accurate content, and best of all, it is FREE
